title: 签名档如何实现-加粗->颜色->外链接->大小同在？
author: Mccraft-pepsi

replies.author: kj415j45
replies.txt_content:
Ice_tuzi 发表于 2016-4-30 11:52
我觉得【b】应该放在【url】里面，不然优先级不够就麻烦了
[url=网址][size=字号][color=颜色][b]文字[/b][/color][/size][/url]复制代码

replies.author: Tinmate
replies.txt_content: 请问，你是想要在一句话上同时实现还是多句话上同时实现

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
[b]加粗[/b]
[color=#ff0000←这里输入颜色#ff0000是红色]颜色[/color]
[url=输入地址]外链[/url]
[size=1至7]修改大小[/size]复制代码

replies.author: Ice_tuzi
replies.txt_content: [b][url=网址][size=字号][color=颜色]文字[/color][/size][/url][/b]复制代码

replies.author: kj415j45
replies.txt_content:
比如我的签名其实是有这个效果的:
[url=http://adf.ly/1W9fIn][size=4][color=Blue][b]石头剪刀布[/b][/color][/size][/url]复制代码
